job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Junior Software Engineer (Front End)</p><p><br></p><p>GavinHeath is partnering with a client who is looking to hire a Junior Software Engineer on a 100% remote basis. This is a direct hire position.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>This role could be a great fit for you if</u></strong>:</p><ul><li>You have developed React-based web applications used by multiple users in a production environment, or...</li><li>You have developed web applications using another JavaScript framework used by multiple users in a production environment and have experience on a software development team, or...</li><li>You can provide multiple examples of non-production web applications you have developed and have formal education in front-end development and have experience on a software development team</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong></p><ul><li>Play a key role on a small, highly productive team of experienced developers</li><li>Develop high quality product features that get used, every day</li><li>Produce high quality code through thoughtful design, diligent execution and good test coverage</li><li>Provide well-structured code for review by team members and engage in thoughtful and critical discussions</li><li>Contribute ideas to the team and the company as a whole to improve how we work</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Qualifications</u></strong></p><ul><li>Formal computer science or software engineering education or equivalent knowledge and skills gained through multi-year, professional experience</li><li>Demonstrable examples of modern web application components you have developed</li><li>Strong software development fundamentals and problem-solving skills</li><li>An understanding of user interface software design</li><li>Experience using modern web application development tools and technologies</li><li>A passion for learning and education</li><li>A desire to go above and beyond to do what is right for our customers</li><li>Intellectual curiosity and a willingness to learn and share with others you work with</li><li>A high standard of excellence in the work you do</li><li>Good communication skills and cognitive empathy</li></ul><p></p>
